```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(bipartite)

get_community_level_indices <- function(network_path)
{
  network <- read_csv(file = network_path)
  plant_richness = nrow(network)
  pollinator_richness = ncol(network)-1 # last column is exotic classification
  total_species_richness = plant_richness + pollinator_richness
  richness_ratio = pollinator_richness/plant_richness
  c(plant_richness, pollinator_richness, total_species_richness, richness_ratio)
}

networks_dir = "G:/My Drive/PhD/plant_pollinator_inter/Stouffer2014/raw_CSVs/networks/"
networks_paths = list.files(networks_dir)
community_level_values = data.frame(matrix(ncol = 5, nrow = 0))
colnames(community_level_values) = c("network_path", "plant_richness", "pollinator_richness", "total_species_richness", "richness_ratio")
for (network_path in networks_paths)
{
  network_features = get_community_level_indices(paste(networks_dir,network_path, sep=""))
  community_level_values[nrow(community_level_values) + 1,] = c(c(network_path),network_features)
}
write.csv(community_level_values, "community_level_values.csv", row.names = TRUE)

```
